title: Identification of Social Risk-Related Referrals in Discrete Primary Care Electronic Health Record Data: Lessons Learned From a Novel Methodology
details: J Dankovchik, R Gold, A Ochoa, J Donovan, R Gunn… - Health services research
abstract: Objective To assess the utility of using discrete primary care electronic health record (EHR) data to identify social risk referrals in a national network of community-based clinics. Data sources and study setting Primary data were abstracted from the OCHIN …
